name: Music_2989.wav
caption: An orchestra is playing a piece full of mallets playing a part of the melody, along with strings, flutes and oboes playing the main melody. Timpani hits and cymbals are setting accents to give the composition its power. In the background you can hear a whistle blowing sound and other noise that seem not to belong to the music. This song may be playing in an adventure movie-scene with little insects.
